For Wave Bus to work, we need to access your location. Your location enables us to find which buses you need to know about. Please enable the location permission. Enable Permission

Set a PokeBus! Bus: B16 \nStopeCode: 36148 \nbody of information i like to write a lot of garbage \njusdt for a test giberish is my tone of just \ndude infoprmations a wall of text Setting a Pokebus enables the fastest way to know when a bus is approaching a specific stop. Set the stop and use the included black launcher. A Pokebus stop is blue. You can enable multiple Pokebuses. The bus stop that is closest to you will be chosen. You can remove your Pokebuses in the settings menu. SET CANCEL
